infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We use the camera to capture Images that users can upload to our servers explicitly when submitting their audit reports.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow choosing photos to attach as evidence for Cleanliness & Hygiene practices during auditing process.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Allow saving photos and certificates to your library.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: We use your location to provide personalized experiences based on your current location, such as showing nearby places and services. Capturing location to record where the audit process is happening.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: We use your location in the background to provide continuous services, such as tracking your activity or showing real-time location-based updates.
